about_the_game:
WHAT'S THE GAME?

It's a third person disc golf simulator designed to give an authentic playing experience similar to being on the course with physics of actual disc golf - giving both challenge and reward!

WHAT'S DISC GOLF?

Disc golf plays very similar to golf but uses concaved discs that are thrown into baskets rather than golf balls that are hit by clubs into holes. If you've never played golf of any sort this is your gateway!

WHAT CAN YOU DO?

Play one 18 hole course in the demo! Experience realistic gameplay while being surrounded by highly detailed nature.

name: FLEX Disc Golf Demo
short_description: A free roam disc golf simulator to play courses throughout the world, find lost discs or buy new ones, and learn new throws and styles! Experience realistic gameplay while being surrounded by highly detailed nature. Rise up the online leaderboards, grow your disc bag, and of course - hit some trees!
